# Pre-Reading Quizzes {.unnumbered}

Pre-reading quizzes help you identify what you should focus on in each chapter.

## How to Use

- Complete BEFORE reading the chapter
- Be honest - these help identify knowledge gaps
- Review answers to understand prerequisites
- Retake after reading chapter to see improvement

## Sample Quiz Format

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Quiz 1: Introduction (Sample)

**Question 1**: What is [key concept]?

a) Option A
b) Option B (Correct)
c) Option C
d) Option D

**Answer**: B

**Explanation**: Brief explanation of why B is correct.
:::
